forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun casts its warm glow upon the city, illuminating the iconic skyline with a gentle brilliance. Though temperatures are comfortably settled near 63, a slight cooling trend beckons as the day wanes. With a soft west-southwest breeze whispering at about 9 miles per hour, the air feels fresh and invigorating, creating a pleasant contrast to the burgeoning warmth of the sun. As evening approaches, the skies remain predominantly clear, promising a tranquil night with lows dipping to around 50. 

The outlook is unmistakably bright, with fog lingering mainly over the coastal areas and the Golden Gate Bridge, lending an air of ethereal charm to the surroundings. Dressing in layers would be advisable; a light sweater or jacket will keep you comfortable as the chill settles in later. With such splendid weather and scenic clarity, it’s an ideal time for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet cafe visit where one can savor a good book or simply watch the world go by. There’s a calming beauty in the simplicity of this day, an invitation to pause and relish the moment as the sun dips below the horizon.
